ygData.subject: Re: Duel Wield Preferences
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 20 I currently alternate between my dragoon dirk, barbed leather whip, and enamelled black mace to keep all my skills up.  It seems to me though that
ygData.messageBody:
At level 20 I currently alternate between my dragoon dirk, barbed leather
whip, and enamelled black mace to keep all my skills up. It seems to me
though that the whip is a big stamina drainer and I'll probably be looking
to replace it soon, it was a gift though, so I cannot complain too much.
I'll probably end up keeping the mace and the dirk for a long while as
they seem to do the job pretty well and a lot of the 'better' stuff seems
to cost more than I've gathered throughout my career. The dirk I bought
for 40 if I recall correctly, the mace for 230 (though I have heard that
the mace can sometimes go for a lot more.)
Unless I'm really focusing on raising my piercing, I just leave the dirk
in my off hand (as it's the fastest of the three and thus has the best
chance of being useful) and swap the mace and the whip in my primary.



Timmian Trueheart
Erollisi Marr




> From: Douglas Drew <Douglas.A.Drew@...>
> Greetings all,
> Hail and well met everyone ) I'm a new member to this list and I play a
> Bard of the 18th Song. I was wondering if anyone had any preferences as to
> what weapons you Duel Wield. Currently I am using a PGT and Combine
> Scimitar. The only other character I have is a Cleric so I really don't
> have much experience with melee weaps and though I expect I will be playing
> instruments most of the time, I was wondering what you all use. Any
> suggestions? Thanks
> Konus
> Bard of the 18th Song
> The Rathe
